document_data.title: Dawn of Night
document_data.author: [[Paul S. Kemp]]
document_data.realm year: [[1373 DR]]<ref group="note">The novel is undated, but perforce occurs between [[Eleint]] and [[Kythorn]] of 1373 DR, the dates of the preceding and following books of the trilogy.
